column5: Hit up long lake yesterday. lots of ice and the bite was on but no fish! long lake has splake,rain bows and laketrout. But the rainbows are finichy fish and are nibblers not biters.
Well that ALMOST sounds good    Just kidding...at least you got out on the ice and had enough action to keep you coming back for more....what were you using?
We were using shiners and chubs. The fish i missed were on chubs and about 4ft under the ice.
